entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please wait while we connect you to the next available agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Yes, hi. I need to return something. I'm not happy at all with it.
I understand. Could you please provide me with some information about the item you'd like to return?
It's the VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little over two weeks ago. It's junk. Doesn't work half the time. I want my money back.
Okay, I understand. The VeloBand Pulse can be frustrating if it's not syncing correctly. Let me check your purchase date...and what is your order number or email address associated with the purchase?
It's order number VP-789456. And hurry up, I don't have all day.

Thank you. Let me pull that up for you. Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. Generally, we have a very generous return policy here at VeloFit. Our standard policy allows returns for up to 90 days.
90 days? Great! So I can return it, right? It's only been, like, 15 days. This smart watch thing is a waste of money.
Yes, absolutely. Since you are well within our 90 days return policy, we can definitely process a return for the VeloBand Pulse. I apologize that it wasn't what you expected.
So what do I do? Just mail it back?

I can email you a prepaid shipping label. Just repackage the VeloBand Pulse in its original box, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive it, we'll process the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. Do that. Email me the label.

Absolutely. And I can also email you a link to our VeloFit support page, if you'd like. It has some helpful tips on troubleshooting common issues with the VeloBand Pulse, in case you ever decide to give our products another chance. Although some products, such as the VeloBand Pulse have a limited 10 days return window.
Nah, I'm good. Just send the label. Thanks.
You're very welcome. I've just sent the email with the prepaid shipping label. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's it. Thanks for the help.
You're very welcome. Thank you for calling VeloFit, have a great day!
